content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-11.5, 18.5)
Consists of steam engine (position -11.5, 18.5), boiler (position -11.5, 25.0), and offshore pump (position -9.5, 24.5).

### Pipe network
Consists of multiple pipes connecting the steam engine and boiler to the offshore pump, facilitating fluid transfer.

### Furnace at position(0, 0)
Consists of a stone furnace (position 0.0, 0.0).

### Furnace at position(5, 5)
Consists of a stone furnace (position 5.0, 5.0).

### Lab at position(unknown)
Consists of a lab (position unknown).

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when attempting to connect boiler to offshore pump
- Ensure that the positions of the boiler and offshore pump are correctly aligned and that there are no obstacles preventing the connection. Verify the coordinates before attempting to connect.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
